articles.title: Study reveals that watching football is actually good for your health
articles.description: Just watching a game can be a healthy workout for your heart, but lose and you'll be feeling the effects for days
articles.content:
Rejoice! A study conducted by the University of Leeds and BetVictor has revealed the potential health benefits of watching football.
